verses.verse: [Put] the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> to your <S%H2441>lips!<s%> Like an <S%H5404>eagle<s%> [the enemy comes] <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> they have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> And <S%H6586>rebelled<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> My <S%H8451>law.<s%>
They <S%H2199>cry<s%> out to Me, "My <S%H430>God,<s%> we of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> Thee!"

They have <S%H4427>set<s%> up <S%H4427>kings,<s%> but not by Me; They have <S%H8323>appointed<s%> <S%H8323>princes,<s%> but I did not <S%H3045>know<s%> [it.] With their <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> they have <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H6091>idols<s%> for themselves, That they might be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off.<s%>

He has <S%H2186>rejected<s%> your <S%H5695>calf,<s%> O <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> saying, "My <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H2734>burns<s%> against them!" <S%H4970>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will they be <S%H3808>incapable<s%> <S%H3201><s%> of <S%H5356>innocence<s%>?

For from <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is even <S%H1931>this!<s%> A <S%H2796>craftsman<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> it, so it is not <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H3588>Surely<s%> the <S%H5695>calf<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> will be <S%H7616>broken<s%> to <S%H7616>pieces.<s%>

For they <S%H2232>sow<s%> the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> And they <S%H7114>reap<s%> the <S%H5492>whirlwind.<s%> The <S%H7054>standing<s%> <S%H7054>grain<s%> <S%H369>has<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H6780>heads;<s%> It <S%H6213>yields<s%> <S%H1097>no<s%> <S%H7058>grain.<s%> <S%H194>Should<s%> it <S%H6213>yield,<s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%> would <S%H1104>swallow<s%> it up.
<S%H3478>Israel<s%> is <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> up; They are <S%H6258>now<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> Like a <S%H3627>vessel<s%> in which <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> <S%H2656>delights.<s%>
For they have <S%H5927>gone<s%> up to <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> [Like] a <S%H6501>wild<s%> <S%H6501>donkey<s%> all <S%H909>alone;<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> has <S%H8566>hired<s%> <S%H158>lovers.<s%>

<S%H1571>Even<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> they <S%H8566>hire<s%> [allies] among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H6258>Now<s%> I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> them up; And they will <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H4592>diminish<s%> <S%H4480>Because<s%> of the <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8269>princes.<s%>
<S%H3588>Since<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> has <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> for <S%H2398>sin,<s%> They have <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> of <S%H2398>sinning<s%> for him.
Though I <S%H3789>wrote<s%> for him <S%H7239>ten<s%> <S%H7239>thousand<s%> [precepts] of My <S%H8451>law,<s%> They are <S%H2803>regarded<s%> as a <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H2114>thing.<s%>

As for My <S%H2077>sacrificial<s%> <S%H1890>gifts,<s%> They <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> [it,] [But] the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7521>taken<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7521>delight<s%> in them. <S%H6258>Now<s%> He will <S%H2142>remember<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> And <S%H6485>punish<s%> [them] for their <S%H9128>sins;<s%> They will <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

For <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> his <S%H6213>Maker<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1964>palaces;<s%> And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> has <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> But I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> on its <S%H5892>cities<s%> that it may <S%H398>consume<s%> its <S%H759>palatial<s%> <S%H759>dwellings.<s%>
